@roytang @alcinnz

Matrix is NOT fully encrypted, so please stop advertising it as such. Matrix is good for community discussion and etc. but it doesn't encrypt many things including the metadata, hence a bad bad choice for private personal chats where reactions and metadata can potentially leak a lot of info:

https://fosstodon.org/@Mehrad/107614485435751742

Second, I can't see any signs of Sessions in your list. It is fully FOSS, It is not centralised, it uses Tor and it seems to be a good alternative to WhatsApp
